title: Application.Submit.Input
description: Profile-aware input for the Application.Submit capability.

profile.description: Optional reference to the applicant profile to load.

profilePatch.description: Optional modifications to apply to the loaded profile.

job_posting_ref.description: Reference to the job posting being applied to.

resume_bundle.description: Minimized resume and skills bundle from Data-Steward.

attachments.description: Optional attachments such as PDFs, portfolios, or writing samples.

ats_metadata.description: Applicant Tracking System metadata (e.g., submission channel, form fields).

context.description: Optional context from the requesting agent.
